Title: Relates to the processing of health claims
Summary: Requires the use of the current edition of American medical association's current procedural terminology (CPT) with respect to claims for evaluation and management codes.
LawCode: Amd ยง3224-b, Ins L; amd ยง4406-c, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law and the public health law, in relation to the processing of health claims
